channel.title: Research Highlights on Weatherup Group
channel.description: Recent content in Research Highlights on Weatherup Group

item.title: Operando X-ray Techniques
item.description: Observing reactions under operating conditions to understand how catalysts and functional materials transform during operation.

item.title: Electrocatalysis
item.description: Investigating electrocatalytic processes for water splitting, COâ‚‚ conversion, and sustainable ammonia synthesis.

item.title: Rechargeable Battery Interfaces
item.description: Understanding degradation mechanisms in lithium-ion batteries through operando studies and advanced spectroscopy.

item.title: Electrolyte Solvation and Transport
item.description: Understanding how electrolyte solvation structure affects transport properties and electrochemical stability.

item.title: Thermocatalysis
item.description: Redesigning chemical industry processes to use sustainable feedstocks instead of fossil fuels.

item.title: Electronic Structure Simulations
item.description: Computational research using DFT and CTM theory to predict properties and interpret experimental findings.
